title: Number Two
content:
Part of: **[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016051444/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016051444/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : [Rounded Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016051444/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rounded%20Typefaces)**

Current URL:  
 [http://www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Number+Two/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016051444/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Number+Two/ "http://www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Number+Two/")

Designed by [Martha Stutteregger](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016051444/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Martha%20Stutteregger) 1996

Published by [Lineto](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016051444/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lineto)

An early [Sans serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016051444/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sans%20serif) typeface called "Berthold Schmale Runde Grotesk" inspired me for this design. It is beautifully suited for headlines, but works surprisingly well even for text setting.
author: AndrewSipe
